body:
Overview

'BlazeBall' is a classic skill based arcade game. Jump and bounce your ball through 10 challenging tracks as fast as possible. Use the fields on the course to your advantage to get the highest possible score.

Here are some screenshots of the current state:



BlazeBall by Jens Riemschneider is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License.
Based on a work at https://github.com/jriemsch/BlazeBall.
Please note that the work in this repository is not for commercial use!
name: Blazeball
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
